document.full_text: an early morning fire roared through a suburban chicago apartment building on sunday, killing six people, three of them children, and injuring 12 other people, authorities said.
document.title: fire in chicago suburb kills three adults, three children
lines_and_colors: an early morning fire roared through a suburban chicago apartment building on sunday, killing six people, three of them children, and injuring 12 other people, authorities said.
